import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { classes } from './styles'; import { Container, Box, Typography, Grid, AppBar, Button, TextField } from '@mui/material'; import { Accordion } from '@mui/material'; import AccordionSummary from '@mui/material/AccordionSummary'; import AccordionDetails from '@mui/material/AccordionDetails'; import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore'; import { useState } from 'react'; import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; import { ClickAwayListener } from '@mui/material'; import store from '../../index'; import { hideCreateAction } from '../../actions/posts'; import {createPost} from '../../actions/posts' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const CreatePost = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleClickAway = () => { store.dispatch(hideCreateAction()) } const disableScroll = (param) => { document.body.style.overflow = param } const [postData, setPostData] = useState({ author: '', image: '', location: '', title: '' }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(createPost(postData)) } return <> {disableScroll('hidden')}
